title: Celia García Ayala
text: Celia García Ayala (born 6 January 1971) is a <a href="Mexican%20people">Mexican</a> politician from the <a href="Party%20of%20the%20Democratic%20Revolution">Party of the Democratic Revolution</a>. In 2012 she served as Deputy of the <a href="LXI%20Legislature%20of%20the%20Mexican%20Congress">LXI Legislature of the Mexican Congress</a> representing <a href="Michoac%C3%A1n">Michoacán</a>.
